name: my friend is a ghost
description:
STORY

It's been a while since you felt anything. The only thing that reminds you of human feelings are your poems. Melancholy is the only company you have for the rest of your life... or so you thought.

After moving to a lonely suburban city in the middle of nowhere, you found a little ghost in your new room. They don't speak, but somehow having someone to greet you feels nice. And so, you decide to hang out for a little bit.

"Seize the day", as they say. Something unexpected might happen.

FEATURES

- A nameable ghost friend! (and a default name as well)

- A very unexpressive boy! (and kinda depressed too)

- Three endings!

WARNINGS

- Curse words, parents fighting, mention of death.

CREDITS

- Story, art, programming, GUI - Helen (@lenlen403)

- Paper textures from Pixabay, rock texture from Freepik

- Sounds by ZapSplat and n_audioman (freesound.org)

- Music by JuliusH (from Pixabay) and Nobody (check their channel, they're very talented!!!)

                       

Made for NaNoReNo 2022!
